actions.text: Notwithstanding the passage of S. 4049 and the adoption of amendment SA 2301 to S. 4049, the instruction line for amendment SA 2417 is modified by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 2417 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 2417 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Manchin to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4191) To modify the requirements for the Department of Energy response to the review by the Nuclear Weapons Council of the budget of the National Nuclear Security Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2417 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2417 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Manchin to Amendment SA 2301.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To modify the requirements for the Department of Energy response to the review by the Nuclear Weapons Council of the budget of the National Nuclear Security Administration.
